body:
"Dammit. The fucking bastard not only took the wife, but also that monthly he is going to take part of his salary from the poor guy. What a shit"

Well, it could have been worse. They usually don't leave any loose ends when they steal something important from others. However, he did not count on someone to create a reality where another version of him will not have the same fate that his creator gave him

"I know. To be able to create a universe where neither Yoriko, her husband or all the previous girls were ever victims of Saito's fucking"

Heheheh, that's right. Although it seems that there is still one last trip to be made. The bastard has put his interest back in Azusa

"Understood. Save her from that fucking raper!"
@ranerong that's what a beta cuck would say, and fuck you. Everyone has their preferences even if it's kinkiest of them all.
I think I've thrown my humanity
I don't mind the NTR and ugly bastard, but this guy has a punchable face. I can't get boner, help.
ya all got boner from this? lol...ya have issue... xD
this site has been taken over by repugnant fatties and pedos lmao
Ugly bastard authors most likely look like the ugly bastard in question, minus the huge dick tho

"I have to do what I was told"
" to be become a cuckold is my goal in life"

OK understandable have a nice day
So what's the end goal here, and I'm not talking about the fat bastard I'm talking about the author's morality here.
@Animefan39 I completely agree
I'm not too keen on hypnotism but this dude is definitely winning big time! Deserved a spot on my favorites!
There really is something wrong with this guy, a slutty personality is way hotter then having no personality.
Last chapter is a harem between all his hypnotized girls I think..
ntr is for trash idiots who will die alone and unloved. kill all cucks!!!
So this guy gets a feeling of superiority by steeling. What the fuck is that. This site needs a thumbs down button to warn people

Well, he ruined another couple. Wonder what happens when their hypnosis wears off and they  remember everything. Only two more chapters? Tell me he gets caught and something bad happens to him. This guy is the worst.
Inb4 all gays start complaining about the guy not looking good to them
I like the artstyle a lot
I, for one, am extremely appreciative of these getting translated. Maaaan, it's about damn time
660 ugly bastard fans rise up
Just 2 more to go everyone
